name: Scooter Adventures pt.1
description:
Scooter Adventures is a series of narrative nfts.
It is an unreleased short film that i created a year ago and splitted in parts. Anyone who collects all the parts will be able to assemble them to see Scooter Adventures as it was originally conceived, in it's entirety.

It's a story about loss, adventure and finding yourself.
Each of us as a goblin inside,
we are all goblins
